attributes.action: Stop paying billions of pounds to the French government for stopping the boats.
attributes.additional_details: I want our government to put a stop to this practice as billions of pounds of our hard working money is being paid to people who are economic migrants and do not put any money into our economy. We should have s points system to bring in people we need. Enough is enough!
attributes.background: I want our government to stop paying the French government billions of pounds when they clearly do not. The French police have been seen on more than one occasion letting mainly young men and sometimes children board these dangerous vessels.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728872
